name: Dud0 GameDev
description:
Dud0 GameDev is a crazy game developer. he is so crazy that even while walking in public area, he is working on a game. you have to SAVE him from accidents which an occur in the surrounding. Press  SPACE BAR to throw items such as MANHOLE, WOOD, and STONE. Press UP AND DOWN arrow keys to switch between items.

GoodLuck.
